channel.title: secondary metabolism on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in secondary metabolism on funPlantGenes

item.title: ClEXPA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA1 Gene Name: α-expansin1 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: ClEXPA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: ClEXPA2 Gene Name: α-expansin2 Genome: Species: Cunninghamia lanceolata Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of two cambium-abundant Chinese fir (Cunninghamia lanceolata) α-expansin genes ClEXPA1 and ClEXPA2 affect growth and development in transgenic tobacco and increase the amount of cellulose in stem cell walls.

item.title: CslG2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Solyc07g043390 Gene Symbol: CslG2 Gene Name: Genome: Tomato Genome version SL4.

item.title: FvLOX3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: FvH4_6g34960 Gene Symbol: FvLOX3 Gene Name: lipoxygenase 3 Genome: Species: Fragaria vesca Functional Descriptions: FvMPK6 phosphorylates FvJAZ12 at the amino acid residues S179 and T183 adjacent to the PY residues, thereby attenuating its nuclear accumulation and relieving its repression for FvMYC2, which acts to control the expression of lipoxygenase 3 (FvLOX3), an important gene involved in JA biosynthesis and a diverse array of cellular metabolisms.

item.title: GbEXPATR
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: GbEXPATR Gene Name: Genome: Species: Gossypium barbadense Functional Descriptions: GbEXPATR, a species-specific expansin, enhances cotton fibre elongation through cell wall restructuring.

item.title: IbPAL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: IbPAL1 Gene Name: phenylalanine ammonia lyase Genome: Species: Ipomoea batatas Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of IbPAL1 promotes chlorogenic acid biosynthesis in sweetpotato.

item.title: IGPS1;IGS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Zm00001eb309260 Gene Symbol: IGPS1 IGS Gene Name: indole-3-glycerolphosphate synthase1 Genome: Zm-B73-REFERENCE-NAM-5.

item.title: MaNAC1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ma06_g28730 Gene Symbol: MaNAC1 Gene Name: NAC transcription factor1 Genome: banana A genome Species: Musa acuminata Functional Descriptions: Our findings revealed that MaNAC1 performs a vital role as a positive modulator in modulating cell wall cellulose metabolism within banana fruit under chilling stress.

item.title: MS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G281800 Gene Symbol: MS2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation of MS2 confers male fertility and drives hybrid breeding in soybean.

item.title: NtMYB305a
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtMYB305a Gene Name: Genome: genome of N.

item.title: NtNAC028
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtNAC028 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtNAC028 and NtNAC080 form heterodimers to regulate jasmonic acid biosynthesis during leaf senescence in Nicotiana tabacum.

item.title: NtNAC080
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: NtNAC080 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Nicotiana tabacum Functional Descriptions: Transcription factors NtNAC028 and NtNAC080 form heterodimers to regulate jasmonic acid biosynthesis during leaf senescence in Nicotiana tabacum.

item.title: OASA2
item.description: Gene Details: MSU gene ID: LOC_Os03g15780 RAPdb gene ID: Os03g0264400 Gene Symbol: OASA2 Genome: MSU7 , IRGSP-1.

item.title: PpbZIP44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: PpbZIP44 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Prunus persica Functional Descriptions: A pear S1-bZIP transcription factor PpbZIP44 modulates carbohydrate metabolism, amino acid, and flavonoid accumulation in fruits.

item.title: SmJAZ8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmJAZ8 Gene Name: jasmonate ZIM-domain protein 8 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: SmJAZ8 acts as a core repressor regulating JA-induced biosynthesis of salvianolic acids and tanshinones in Salvia miltiorrhiza hairy roots.

item.title: SmMYB36
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SmMYB36 Gene Name: MYB transcription factor 36 Genome: Species: Salvia miltiorrhiza Functional Descriptions: SmMYB36, a Novel R2R3-MYB Transcription Factor, Enhances Tanshinone Accumulation and Decreases Phenolic Acid Content in Salvia miltiorrhiza Hairy Roots.

item.title: VviAGL11
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_18s0041g01880 Gene Symbol: VviAGL11 Gene Name: AGAMOUS-LIKE 11 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: VviAGL11 self-regulates and targets hormone- and secondary metabolism-related genes during seed development.
